_________________________ Entry Level Templates _________________________ source: Annotation note (e.g. http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-emed/branches/master/StructureDefinition-ch-emed-medicationdispense.html) target: https://art-decor.org/art-decor/decor-templates--cdachemed-?section=templates&id=2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.2 Note/Warning: we assume that there is a narrativeLink extension which refers to the text which should be the same as in note.text

source: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-emed/branches/master/StructureDefinition-ch-emed-medicationdispense.html target: https://art-decor.org/art-decor/decor-templates--cdachemed-?id=2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.39

source: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-emed/branches/master/StructureDefinition-ch-emed-medicationdispense.html target: https://art-decor.org/art-decor/decor-templates--cdachemed-?section=templates&id=2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.33&effectiveDate=2019-12-11T11:34:24&language=en-US
if the value of numerator.code is "1", then it is not a UCUM code, so generate case 1 IHE: Case 1: If the capacityQuantity is given in countable units, the unit attribute SHALL NOT be present

if the value of numerator.code is not "1", then it is a UCUM code, so generate case 2 IHE: Case 2: If the capacityQuantity is given in non-countable units, the unit attribute SHALL be present and the value SHALL be out of the UCUM code system.
if there ist no numerator.code, case 1 is generated, because no unit exists
package size

source: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-emed/branches/master/StructureDefinition-ch-emed-medicationdispense.html target: https://art-decor.org/art-decor/decor-templates--cdachemed-?section=templates&id=2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.42
TODO: AUTHOR1 Medication Treatment Plan Author TODO: AUTHOR2 Community Medication Treatment Plan document author dosage for normal dosing, as no sequences are present there
split dosing (with sequences): effectiveTime (start/stop) & routeCode & consumable
split dosing (with sequences): sequence number, effectiveTime (when), dose quantity, consumable
dosage for split dosing, as sequences are present there

TODO: Patient Medication Instructions Contains 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.3 IHE Patient Medication Instructions (DYNAMIC) TODO: Amount of units of the consumable to dispense TODO: ID of parent container (Community Medication Treatment Plan document) TODO: Precondition Criterion

TODO: Contains 2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.37 Dosage Intake Mode Entry Content Module (DYNAMIC) see group DosageInstructionsNonStructuredEntryContentModule Number of packages IHE-DIS: Case 1: If the product-element contains package information, the unit attribute is not be present IHE-DIS: Case 2: If the product-element does not contain package information, the unit attribut is present and the value SHALL be out of the UCUM code system FHIR: Because the package information (Medication.amount) of the MedicationDispense is required, only case 1 (IHE-DIS) occurs

source: http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-emed/StructureDefinition/ch-emed-dosage-structured target: https://art-decor.org/art-decor/decor-templates--ch-pharm-?id=2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.35 dosage for normal dosing (without sequences)

source: http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-emed/StructureDefinition/ch-emed-dosage-structured target: https://art-decor.org/art-decor/decor-templates--ch-pharm-?id=2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.36 dosage for split dosing: effectiveTime (start/stop) & routeCode & consumable
if the FHIR document has a dosage templateId -> take over the templateId
if the FHIR doucment has no dosage templateId -> create templateId for split dose

source: http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-emed/StructureDefinition/ch-emed-dosage-structured target: https://art-decor.org/art-decor/decor-templates--ch-pharm-?id=2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.36 dosage for split dosing: sequence number, effectiveTime (when), dose quantity, consumable
effective time low and high for dosage
effective time when for normal dosage
effective time when for split dosage
dose quantity for dosage (application schema)
